text: Buellton is a small city in Santa Barbara County, California, United States. It is located in the Santa Ynez Valley, 3 miles west of Solvang. The population was 5,161 at the 2020 census, up from 4,828 at the 2010 census. Located at the junction of U.S. Route 101 and State Route 246, Buellton attracts many travelers. Category:Settlements in Santa Barbara County, California Category:Cities in California
title: Buellton, California
